attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. This manual Italian beauty will blow you away and yes the mileage is correct She is exceptionally clean and mechanically sound with Full Service History. The 159 was designed by Giorgetto Giugiaro in collaboration with the Centro Stile Alfa Romeo. The nose features a traditional Alfa Romeo V-shaped grille and bonnet, and cylindrical headlight clusters.She also has a full house of features that include; blue tooth, cruise control, leather, climate control and more. At CBK Motors we take things a little more seriously and do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O 
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
Patrick: 068 521 2876
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)
attributes.title: 2011 Alfa Romeo 159 3.2 Distinctive
